dsls.name: Integration
dsls.description: An Integration defines a workflow of actions and steps.

dsls.name: Camel Route
dsls.description: A camel route is a non deployable in cluster workflow of actions and steps.

dsls.name: Kamelet
dsls.description: A Kamelet is a snippet of a route. It defines meta building blocks or steps that can be reused on integrations.

dsls.name: KameletBinding
dsls.description: Kamelet Bindings are used to create simple integrations that link a start step to an end step with optional intermediate action steps.
